LanguageData.DMS_AssaultPiercer.label: assault piercer
LanguageData.DMS_AssaultPiercer.description:
a submachine gun chambered in the high-caliber round, capable of quick draw penetrating most of the armored targets in short range. Refered as piercer due to lack of comparable weapon in human arsenal.
This weapon is designed specially for automatroid use, thus normal human may be unable to use them normally without external assistance equipment or being extra strong.
LanguageData.DMS_AssaultPiercer.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_AssaultPiercer.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_Pistol.label: tactical autopistol bullet
LanguageData.DMS_Flameblaster.label: flameblaster
LanguageData.DMS_Flameblaster.description: A flame launcher used by mechs that can effectively ignite flammable materials within a range
LanguageData.DMS_Flameblaster.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Flameblaster.tools.barrel-0.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Flameblaster.tools.barrel-1.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_PDW.label: PDW
LanguageData.DMS_PDW.description: A mass-produced submachine gun, which was designed only capable of hip-fire so it's inaccurate in range but its caliber and ability to draw quick make it the perfect weapon for urban combat against milltor.
LanguageData.DMS_PDW.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_PDW.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_PDW.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: PDW
LanguageData.DMS_TaticalPistol.label: mech pistol
LanguageData.DMS_TaticalPistol.description:
Defensive firearm with refined manufacture process and additional tactical attachments, it's too heavy for human but suitable to mech soldier. offers better stop power than comparable weapons.
This weapon is designed specially for automatroid use, thus normal human may be unable to use them normally without external assistance equipment or being extra strong.
LanguageData.DMS_TaticalPistol.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.DMS_TaticalPistol.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_TaticalPistol.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: mech pistol
